LineIdsProperties.description: A generic object for capturing all purchase order ids as a common set

PurchaseOrderLineId.description: The (required) PurchaseOrderLineId Id, in Xfuze canonical form, identifying this purchase order line amongst other lines, in the form of PurchaseOrderLine::[type]_[sourceSystem]_[PurchaseOrderLineKey] e.g PurchaseOrder::Sale_PMC_123456789_1

PurchaseOrderLineKey.description: The (required) 'natural' purchase order line number, typically either a combination of PurchaseOrderNumber & a 'sequence number' (derived) OR explicitly supplied unique Id from source - also used to construct the synthetic SOL Xfuze Ids. e.g 123456789_1

OriginalPurchaseOrderLineId.description: The PurchaseOrderLineId Id, in Xfuze canonical form, identifying an 'original' purchase order, in the form of PurchaseOrder::[type]_[sourceSystem]_[OriginalPurchaseOrderKey] e.g PurchaseOrder::Sale_PMC_987654321

OriginalPurchaseOrderLineKey.description: The original 'natural' purchase order 'key' / 'number', typically as a way to link related orders together the can be physically seperate and need a linking e.g Return,Exchange,

PurchaseOrderLineProductKey.description: An alternate Purchase oder line number, often a combination of PurchaseOrderNumber & a 'product number' (e.g SKU, EAN) - oftent o support grouping of unit SOLs by product number for aggregate Xfuze SOLs.

PurchaseOrderIds.description: The (required) common set of order Ids for this order, not all a required individually, only what can be mapped & derived
